name: Apocalypse rewind (Brackey Game Jam 2020.2)
description:
A Game for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
WARNING: YOU CANNOT BEAT THE GAME WE RAN OUT OF TIME.
You are a scientist in the apocalypse trying to make a time machine and undo the apocalypse before the radiation gets you...
A,W,S,D: to move

e: to interact

smelt and craft items by putting them in the furnace or on the crafting table, check the recipe book for recipes. 

You will have 30 seconds before you die of radiation.
